0.99.2.name: wordpress/kippis
0.99.2.description: Kippis is a very flexible theme. It features up to  three columns. Two sidebars, or one, or no sidebar at all. You can optionally have both sidebars on the same side of the main content area. You can enable/disable the sidebars separately, depending on the type of page (regular, single post, page, and gallery). User defined width. It can be anything, from a few pixels (which would be quite silly) up to thousands. Support for all smartphones. All colors are user defined, e.g. the main areas, widgets, headings, links, the menus, and more. No need to edit style.css. All areas can have user defined fonts. Again, without editing the style.css file. Custom background images for the body element and the header. Use your own favicon, if you wish. Separate settings for mobile devices. Up to four footer areas (like sidebars, but at the bottom). Supports two menus that you can put above or below the header and/or footer. Author pages feature author description, gravatar, number of posts, and more
